{: .warning }
If you import the scene with the "Test" trigger, it needs to happen with the Move plugin **prior** to `3.0.0`. After you've imported the scene successfully, you can update again.


---

## <span class="iconify" data-icon="material-symbols:description-outline-sharp" data-inline="false"></span> Description
Show your four most recent Twitch events on a moving OBS overlay, all done locally. It also supports donation events for Ko-Fi, Streamlabs and Streamelements.

![Picture](assets/media/event_list_title.gif)

---

## <span class="iconify" data-icon="simple-icons:obsstudio" data-inline="false"></span> Required OBS plugins
1. [Stroke Glow Shadow Plugin](https://obsproject.com/forum/resources/stroke-glow-shadow.1800/)
2. [Move Plugin](https://obsproject.com/forum/resources/move.913/)
3. [Source Copy Plugin](https://obsproject.com/forum/resources/source-copy.1261/) 
4. [Advanced Masks Plugin](https://obsproject.com/forum/resources/advanced-masks.1856/)

{: .highlight }
Make sure you have the latest version of Source Copy (Feb 15, 2024) and OBS on version `30.1.1` or newer

---

## <span class="iconify" data-icon="material-symbols:cloud-download" data-inline="false"></span> Downloads
Event list image file: [download here](assets/media/Eventlist%20Bar.png)

---

```

```

---

## <span class="iconify" data-icon="tabler:tool" data-inline="false"></span> Setup
1. Download and install all **four OBS plugins** and download the **image file**.

2. Paste the `Eventlist Bar.png` image right into your StreamerBot folder.

   ![Picture](assets/media/event_list_bar_setup.png)


3. Go back into StreamerBot, copy the import code from above and import the content
   
   ![Import Actions](assets/media/import_actions.png)

5. Go into the `[Event List] Event List + Setup` action, rightclick the "Test" trigger and click "Test trigger". 

   ![Picture](assets/media/event_list_test_trigger.png)

    This creates the scene and sources in OBS. As confirmation it says "Event List setup completed" in your Twitch chat. 

   ![Picture](assets/media/event_list_setup_completed.png)


8. Rightclick the other event triggers and see if it successfully moves and updates for you. Done! 🥳

---

## <span class="iconify" data-icon="material-symbols:settings-alert-rounded" data-inline="false"></span> Settings

It being purely made out of OBS sources, there is not that much to customize. What can be done fairly easily though are changes to the font and the bar colors. 

You can go into the `[Event List] Settings` action and change the name of the font (**exact name as in OBS**), the style (Regular, Bold, Italic) and the size. 

The color can be changed by picking a color in the `Pick Color` subaction. Once you have set everything to your liking, rightclick the "Test" trigger and hit "Test Trigger" to apply the settings.

You can also choose whether you want the profile pictures to have rounded corners or not.

![Picture](assets/media/event_list_settings.png)

---
